inventory.name: book of truth
inventory.description: only true statements are able to be written in this tomb.

inventory.name: small alchemy jug
inventory.description: A random liquid comes out every dawn.

skills.name: Bardic Inspiration
skills.description: Bonus action, give a creature (60ft) one d6 inspriation dice. Can be added to ability check, attack roll, or saving throws.

skills.name: Jack of All Trades
skills.description: Add half your proficiency bonus, rounded down, to any ability check you make that doesn’t already include your proficiency bonus.

skills.name: Song of Rest
skills.description: People in ear shot get extra d6 on short rest.

skills.name: Cutting Words
skills.description: Expend use of Bardic Inspiration, subtract it from creatures roll.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.description: touch creature to heal 1d8 + spellcasting attack mod

spells.name: Sleep
spells.description: Roll 5d8; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can affect. 20 ft range, affects lowest-highest hp creatures. Subtract total hp of creature then move to next creature.

spells.name: Heroism
spells.description: (1 min, Concentration) 2 Creatures are immune to being frightened and gains temp hp equal to spellcasting attack mod. Looses hp when spell ends.

spells.name: Enhance Ability
spells.description:
(1 hr, Concentration), can be one of the following efferts:
	- Bear’s Endurance: Advantage on Cons checks, also gains 2d6 temp hp, lost on spell ending.
	- Bull’s Strength: Advantage on Str checks, carrying capacity doubles.
	- Cat’s Grace: Advantage on Dex checks, no dmg from falling 20 feet or less if it not incapacitated.
	- Eagle’s Splendor: Advantage on Cha checks.
	- Fox’s Cunning: Advantage on Int checks.
	- Owl’s Wisdom: Advantage on Wis checks.

cantrips.name: Friends
cantrips.description: For 1 minute, gain advantage on char checks towards 1 creature. The creature is hostile afterwords.

cantrips.name: Vicious Mockery
cantrips.description: If the target can hear you, it must succeed on a wis throw or take 1d4 psychic damage and have disadvantage on next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

skills.name: Sneak Attack
skills.description: extra d6 to attacks with advantage.

spells.name: Mage Armour
spells.description: (8 hr) willing creatures AC becomes 13 + dex mod.

spells.name: Levitate
spells.description: (10 min, Concentration) Levitate target up to 20 ft, con save if not willing. 500 lb limit.

spells.name: Aganazzar's Scorcher
spells.description: Line of flame 30ft by 5 ft, creature must make a dex if fails 3d8 else half that.

spells.name: Snilloc's Snowball Swarm
spells.description: point errupts with snowballs in a 2 by 2 square within 90 ft. Each creature makes dex save, 3d6 damage or half damage if succeeds.

spells.name: Errupting Earth
spells.description: 120 ft range. chucked earth and stone errupts in 20ft cube centered at point. dex save, 3d12 or half damage on failure. Cube is rough terrain until cleared.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: 150 ft range. Each creature in 20ft radius makes dex throw. 8d6 or half damage if succeeds.

cantrips.name: Frostbite
cantrips.description: con save, if fails, does 1d6 of damage and weapon attack on next turn has disadvantage.

cantrips.name: Poison Spray
cantrips.description: con save, if fails, 1d12 of damage to creature within 10 ft.

cantrips.name: Minor Illusion
cantrips.description: (1 min) sound or image of object within 30 ft. Object must fit into 5 ft cube. obj cannot create sensory effects and is revealed when interacted with. Investigation against spell save DC.

cantrips.name: Sword Burst
cantrips.description: Circle of blades around you. Each creature in range, other than you, must make dex save or take 1d6.

cantrips.name: Fire Bolt
cantrips.description: hurl a fireball in 120ft range as spell attack, does 1d10 of dmg. Ignites its not being worn or carried.
